description:
11.33 colorcorrect
Adjust color white balance selectively for blacks and whites.
This filter operates in YUV colorspace.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: colorcorrect

options.description: Set the red shadow spot. Allowed range is from -1.0 to 1.0. Default value is 0.
options.name: rl

options.description: Set the blue shadow spot. Allowed range is from -1.0 to 1.0. Default value is 0.
options.name: bl

options.description: Set the red highlight spot. Allowed range is from -1.0 to 1.0. Default value is 0.
options.name: rh

options.description: Set the blue highlight spot. Allowed range is from -1.0 to 1.0. Default value is 0.
options.name: bh

options.description: Set the amount of saturation. Allowed range is from -3.0 to 3.0. Default value is 1.
options.name: saturation

options.description:
If set to anything other than manual it will analyze every frame and use derived parameters for filtering output frame.

Possible values are:

‘manual’
‘average’
‘minmax’
‘median’

Default value is manual.
options.name: analyze
